item.title: MySQL Lahman Database
item.description: Shortly before the start of the 2016 World Series, I imported the Lahman baseball database into MySQL and built a few interesting statistics out of it. There is a Lahman dataset that comes with the dplyr package but I figured it would be good practice to explore the dataset with SQL and R. Hereâ€™s how I went about my cursory glance. Connect to database I used the DBI and RMySQL packages to connect to the Lahman database from R.
